Look I'm going to be honest i have estimated to over 1.5k hours with my two accounts combined. Csgo is a game where you can't rage and you can not get unfocus. Those flick shots and trick shots you see on youtube come later. If you want to get good at CSGO instead of focusing on your aim. Focus on your tactics, how you push in and also learn the map e.g spots ct or t will hold/smokes and grenade shots. If you do that guaranteed you will be good
